verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When the vision seems to tarry and your word to fade away
When the lies fill my ears and it seems evil prevails

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I choose you, I choose you
Lord, I choose to believe
I choose you, I choose you
Father God, I choose to believe

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When the darkness closes in and waves of doubt come crashing down
When it seems all hope is lost and my anchor is losing ground
